toggleTheme.accessibleLabel.description: Accessible label for the theme selection dropdown.
toggleTheme.accessibleLabel.markdownDescription: Accessible label for the theme selection dropdown.

languageSelect.accessibleLabel.description: Accessible label for the language selection dropdown.
languageSelect.accessibleLabel.markdownDescription: Accessible label for the language selection dropdown.

i18n.untranslatedContent.description: Notice informing users they are on a page that is not yet translated to their language.
i18n.untranslatedContent.markdownDescription: Notice informing users they are on a page that is not yet translated to their language.

page.draft.description: Development-only notice informing users they are on a page that is a draft which will not be included in production builds.
page.draft.markdownDescription: Development-only notice informing users they are on a page that is a draft which will not be included in production builds.

404.text.description: Text shown on Vitesse’s default 404 page
404.text.markdownDescription: Text shown on Vitesse’s default 404 page

builtWithVitesse.label.description: Label for the “Built with Vitesse” badge optionally displayed in the site footer.
builtWithVitesse.label.markdownDescription: Label for the “Built with Vitesse” badge optionally displayed in the site footer.

posts.empty.description: Text shown when there are no posts to display
